member.name: T:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.EFSupport.DbMockAndInMemoryProvider`1
member.summary:
Provide TDbContext mock, TDbContext InMemory and TDbContext Sqlite in memory.
https://docs.microsoft.com/pl-pl/ef/core/miscellaneous/testing/in-memory
https://docs.microsoft.com/pl-pl/ef/core/miscellaneous/testing/sqlite

member.name: P:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.EFSupport.DbMockAndInMemoryProvider`1.DbContextMock
member.summary: Gets lazy loaded mock which has not any setup by default.

member.name: P:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.EFSupport.DbMockAndInMemoryProvider`1.DbInMemorySqlite
member.summary: Gets lazy loaded TDbContext which enable tests with Sqlite in memory

member.name: P:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.EFSupport.DbMockAndInMemoryProvider`1.DbInMemory
member.summary: Gets lazy loaded TDbContext which enable tests with InMemory provider.

member.name: M:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.EFSupport.DbMockAndInMemoryProvider`1.SetUp
member.summary: Use it before any test when you want use features provided by provider.

member.name: M:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.EFSupport.DbMockAndInMemoryProvider`1.TearDown
member.summary: Use it after any test when you want use features provided by provider.

member.name: T:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.Exceptions.NegativeTestResultException
member.summary: Exception which should be used only as test fail notification

member.name: T:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.Hubs.HubUnitTestsSupport
member.summary:
Base class which provide support for testing hub (But without auto SetUp by any test engine).
If you cannot use it as base class use it as normal object (but remember to call SetUp after you create new instance)

member.summary: Clear after test

member.name: T:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.Interfaces.IHubUnitTestsWithEF`1
member.summary: To be sure we implement all features for testing pure Hub (or Hub<T>) plus entity framework core

member.name: P:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.Interfaces.IHubUnitTestsWithEF`1.DbContextMock
member.summary: Gets mock for TDbContext which is DbContext child or DbContext itself

member.name: P:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.Interfaces.IHubUnitTestsWithEF`1.DbInMemory
member.summary:
Gets dbContext child or DbContext itself which use InMemoryProvider (not really relatonal).
https://docs.microsoft.com/pl-pl/ef/core/miscellaneous/testing/in-memory

member.name: P:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.Interfaces.IHubUnitTestsWithEF`1.DbInMemorySqlite
member.summary:
Gets dbContext child or DbContext itself which use Sqlite provider configured to run in db in memory (relatonal).
https://docs.microsoft.com/pl-pl/ef/core/miscellaneous/testing/sqlite

member.name: M:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.Interfaces.IHubUnitTestsWithEF`1.TearDown
member.summary: Tear Down object. Prepared for testing engine or user which decided use class which implement that interfeca as object. (instead use one of provided base classes [NUnit, xUnit, MsTest])

member.name: M:SignalR_UnitTestingSupportCommon.Interfaces.ISetUpForUserAndEngine.SetUp
member.summary: Set Up object. Prepared for testing engine or user which decided use class which implement that interfeca as object.
